body.name: AISIDERK 4Pcs Broom and Mop Holder, Stainless Steel Broom Storage Holder, Self Adhesive Anti-Slip Command Broom Holder Wall Mount, Mop Gripper with Hook for Kitchen Bathroom Closet Garden Garage
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 14 mins
features: 【High Quality Material】: This broom storage holder adopts heavy-duty SUS-304 stainless steel and silicone to ensure it is durable, corrosion-resistant and not easily damaged. With a strong adhesive on the back of the mop holder, it has excellent stability and will not fall off easily when it gets wet.

【Easy to Install】: Use the double-sided adhesive on the back of the command broom holder to stick to the wall, no drilling is required, and it can avoid damaging the wall. We recommend that you pre-clean the wall, keep it dry and tidy before sticking these broom holders, so the effect will last longer.

【Sturdy and Stable】: Our broom hanger gripper is designed with a triangular structure and soft silicone rollers, the grip is strong enough, and you don't need to worry about falling off after getting wet. The mop gripper rack with hook provides a stable and secure hold, and it fits most sizes of mops and brooms.

【Multiple Uses】: The broom holder wall mount has a hook design, which can be used to hang towels, rags, kitchen supplies, toilet brushes or other items. And the mop holder with hook can not only hang a mop but also be used for a variety of articles with handles such as gardening tools and rakes.

【Space Saving】: The broom and mop holder can be easily used in the bathroom, behind the door, garage, laundry room, kitchen or other needed spaces. Wall mount broom gripper can obviously save space in your house, keep the house away from clutter, and let you have a more comfortable living space.
body.description: The command broom holder made of high-quality stainless steel can easily help you store those mops, brooms, cleaning supplies, etc., and can achieve strong and stable long-lasting durability without drilling holes.Enjoy these easy-to-use wall mount broom grippers with hooks to start your home organization and keep your cleaning supplies comfortably within reach! Product Name: Broom and Mop Holder Product material: stainless steel, silicone Product size: 3.14*2.55 inches Product color: silver gray Product quantity: 1*4 broom holder wall mount Features: 1. The broom hanger gripper uses silicone elastic rollers, which can easily pick up items and have a significant anti-slip effect, and it is not easy to fall. 2. The mop gripper rack fixture can be widely compatible with mops, brooms and other cleaning tools of various specifications, bringing you more convenience. 3. Wall-mounted mop grippers are suitable for tiles, metal, marble, wood or glass surfaces, and it is recommended that you stick them for 72 hours before hanging them for better results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love how easy it was
reviews.reviewText: Love them, just what I needed on my wall with no convenient studs where I needed them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quick set up
reviews.reviewText: This is need to put all your sweeping sticks on. You can just put it on the wall and attach your broom your mop and it’s all nice and neat and lined up for you with this little device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for hanging up brooms and mops
reviews.reviewText: I've attached these to both drywall and metal surfaces, they are great for your garage or utility room. The 3M adhesive is strong and easy to apply. These holders do a good job of holding lighter-weight objects with long broom-style handles. There's also a J-shaped hook that I used to hang one of those dustpans with the vertical handle. The spring hold the broom is strong and has rubberized surfaces to hold securely. No complaints on this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This set of four broom or mope holders is wonderful. They feel well made and sturdy. I’m tired of brooms and mops leaning against walls and in corners . I’ve had other “ broom holders “ that took up precious narrow wall space . Not very practical if they need a lot of clearance in narrow areas to work.These don’t need a lot of space. In fact the first one I installed is in a narrow space between my fridge and the wall. No more than 4 inches. I was able to reach back and attach one of the broom holders and I am able to get the broom handle back there and place it in the press in latching system that this product has.So far it seems to be holding to the wall just fine . I did wash the wall and dry it before attaching the broom holder. Plus I am letting it “ cure “ in the hopes that it holds well for a long time .My only issue is that there were no instructions on how to use the adhesive or how long to “ cure” it before using the device .Other than that, it’s a good product for a good price!Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A simple design and a strong adhesive make this item great for organizing all your cleaning tools. I am currently using this with a dustpan, broom, and a swiffer wetjet. I have it attached to the side of my metal tool shed but I am sure it'll work on most flat surfaces. Just make sure you clean both sides and let the adhesive set before you place any weight on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Some sharp edges
reviews.reviewText: These work very well at keeping your cleaning equipment well-organized and up off the floor to dry off after use. The 3M stickies that came with it are sturdy and stick very quickly. The clasps are super tight which is great for holding varying rod sizes but the thicker rods definitely take a bit of effort to slide in/take out for the elderly, so keep that in mind if getting this for your grandparents / older relatives.1 less star because a few of them had very sharp, unpolished edges (on the hooks and backing) that scratched up one of my hands when I was unwrapping, so be careful when taking these out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars adhesive is strong...
reviews.reviewText: As shown on picture...I attached them to my pantry fridge. I cleaned the surface first both on the hooks and the fridge. So far the adhesive is working great. Once you stick it can't be pulled out any more, unless you just discarding the adhesive. It can carry heavy mops. Its not hard to remove my broom or mops from the gripper. I will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not hold
reviews.reviewText: This product does not stay on a cleaned dry wall.
